TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool NominalGlyphDelegate(Font font, object fontData, uint unicode, out uint glyph);
.class public auto ansi sealed NominalGlyphDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The user-specified font data associated with the font.
The Unicode code point to map.
When this method returns, contains the glyph identifier for the code point.
Docs.summary: A callback delegate used to retrieve the nominal glyph identifier for a Unicode code point.
Docs.returns: if a glyph was found for the code point; otherwise, .
